mapper.insert: insert into todo (created, content, remind_at, finished, repeat_type, user_id) values (#{created}, #{content}, #{remindAt}, #{finished}, #{repeatType}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from todo where user_id = #{userId} and (remind_at <= #{day} or remind_at is null) and finished is null
select * from todo where user_id = #{userId} and finished >= #{start} and finished <= #{end} order by finished desc
mapper.update: update todo set finished = #{day} where user_id = #{userId} and id = #{id}
